channel.title: Jdk help need major help
channel.description:
ok so my complier says: @echo off COLOR 09 title Homiescape v1 echo ------------------------- echo Cmon.. Compile.. Cmon.. echo ------------------------- "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe" *.java pause cls COLOR 06 echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo W00T DONE echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
when i do compile it gives me:
------------------------- Cmon.. Compile.. Cmon.. ------------------------- Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: */java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: *.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . ._
I need major help

item.title: Jdk help need major help
item.dc:creator: @tennisbro tennisbro
item.description:
@tennisbro wrote:

ok so my complier says:
@echo off
COLOR 09
title Homiescape v1
echo -------------------------
echo Cmon… Compile… Cmon…
echo -------------------------
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe” *.java
pause
cls
COLOR 06
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo W00T DONE
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

when i do compile it gives me:

Cmon… Compile… Cmon…

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: */java
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: *.java
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . ._

I need major help

Read full topic
